sn1.7:1.2: Standing to one side, that deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.7:2.2: who may be led astray by the doctrines of others;
sn1.7:2.3: asleep, they have not woken up:
sn1.7:2.4: it is time for them to wake!”
sn1.7:3.2: who won’t be led astray by the doctrines of others;
sn1.7:3.3: they’ve woken up, they rightly know,
sn1.7:3.4: they live smoothly in the rough.”
